feed.title: Chibisafe Releases

entry.title: New release for Chibisafe: v6.4.5
entry.content:
• bumped version to align with release version

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/compare/v6.4.4...v6.4.5

entry.title: New release for Chibisafe: v6.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add a comparison slider when bulk selecting 2 images by @Pitu in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/717
  • chore: update running-with-docker.mdx by @lakema17 in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/709
  • docs: add fswatch guide by @CovertDuck in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/662
  • docs: update docs url by @xuatz in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/715
  • chore: fix typo in the 'Manage albums' modal by @joshuayuen99 in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/692

New Contributors

  • @CovertDuck made their first contribution in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/662
  • @xuatz made their first contribution in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/715
  • @joshuayuen99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/692

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/compare/v6.4.5...v6.5.0

entry.title: New release for Chibisafe: v6.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: compare slider image loading by @Pitu in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/718
  • x-amz-acl header for DigitalOcean Spaces by @TunayAdaKaracan in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/719
  • feat: remove docs by @Pitu in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/723
  • chore: fixes by @Pitu in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/724
  • fix: #680
  • fix: #727
  • fix: #677

New Contributors

  • @TunayAdaKaracan made their first contribution in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/719

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/compare/v6.5.0...v6.5.3

entry.title: New release for Chibisafe: v6.5.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: prevent fetching albums if not logged in and public uploads is enabled by @Pitu in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/729

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/compare/v6.5.3...v6.5.4

entry.title: New release for Chibisafe: v6.5.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix typo in description by @flazepe in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/730
  • Add path style bucket setting for s3 by @Soulusions in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/746

New Contributors

  • @flazepe made their first contribution in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/730
  • @Soulusions made their first contribution in https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/pull/746

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chibisafe/chibisafe/compare/v6.5.4...v6.5.5
